Package homework2

Class SimulatorTestDriver

java.lang.Object
homework2.SimulatorTestDriver
public class SimulatorTestDriver
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a testing driver for Simulator. The driver manages Simulators for recycling channels

  • Method Details

    • createSimulator

      public void createSimulator​(java.lang.String simName)
      Modifies:
      this
      Effects:
      Creates a new simulator named simName. The simulator's graph is initially empty.
      Requires:
      simName != null

    • addChannel

      public void addChannel​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String channelName, int limit) throws NullPointer
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Modifies:
      simulator named simName
      Effects:
      Creates a new Channel named by the String channelName, with a limit, and add it to the simulator named simName.
      Requires:
      createSimulator(simName) && channelName != null && channelName has not been used in a previous addChannel() or addParticipant() call on this object limit > 0

    • addParticipant

      public void addParticipant​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String participantName, java.lang.String product, int amount) throws NullPointer
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Modifies:
      simulator named simName
      Effects:
      Creates a new Participant named by the String participantName and add it to the simulator named simName.
      Requires:
      createSimulator(simName) && participantName != null && participantName has not been used in a previous addParticipant(), addChannel() call on this object amount > 0 product must be a single word, without special characters/number and also in lowercase

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String parentName, java.lang.String childName, java.lang.String edgeLabel) throws NullPointer
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Modifies:
      simulator named simName
      Effects:
      Adds an edge from the node named parentName to the node named childName in the simulator named simName. The new edge's label is the String edgeLabel.
      Requires:
      createSimulator(simName) && ((addPipe(parentName) && addFilter(childName)) || (addFilter(parentName) && addPipe(childName))) && edgeLabel != null && node named parentName has no other outgoing edge labeled edgeLabel && node named childName has no other incoming edge labeled edgeLabel

    • sendTransaction

      public void sendTransaction​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String channelName, Transaction tx) throws NullPointer
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Modifies:
      channel named channelName
      Effects:
      pushes the Transaction into the channel named channelName in the simulator named simName.
      Requires:
      createSimulator(simName) && addChannel(channelName) A transaction Transaction != null

    • listContents

      public java.lang.String listContents​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String channelName) throws NullPointer
      Returns:
      a space-separated list of the Transaction values currently in the channel named channelName in the simulator named simName.
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Requires:
      addChannel(channelName)

    • getParticipantStorageAmount

      public double getParticipantStorageAmount​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String participantName) throws NullPointer
      Returns:
      The sum of all Transaction amount of stored products that one has in his storage buffer.
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Requires:
      addParticipant(participantName)

    • getParticipantToRecycleAmount

      public double getParticipantToRecycleAmount​(java.lang.String simName, java.lang.String participantName) throws NullPointer
      Returns:
      The sum of all Transaction amount of waiting to be recycled products that one has.
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Requires:
      addParticipant(participantName)

    • simulate

      public void simulate​(java.lang.String simName) throws NullPointer
      Throws:
      NullPointer
      Modifies:
      simulator named simName
      Effects:
      runs simulator named simName for a single time slice.
      Requires:
      createSimulator(simName)
